org.spongepowered.api.event.inventory

Interface ViewerEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContainerEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContainerOpenEvent, CraftItemEvent, InventoryClickEvent, InventoryCloseEvent

    public interface ViewerEvent
extends ContainerEvent
    A ViewerEvent is an InventoryEvent that happens with a specific viewer in a transaction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Human getViewer()
      Retrieves the Human involved with this inventory event.
